name: Three Little Pigs (itch) (Dan)
description:
An experiment to test my ability to create HTML5 content using Twine, an interactive storytelling engine.

This was originally created as a submission for a university assessment in 2016; now I've decided to release it, in the hope to build up my portfolio of work. The writing isn't the best and there's a lot of things I'd change three years on, but hopefully some of you can find enjoyment in it.

Known issues:
- Scaling issues, may not work in some browsers/screen sizes

- Intro movie doesn't always play
